price: ߊ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߛߊߞߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫، ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߌ ߣߌ߫ ߤߌߣߊ، ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߍߣߍ߲߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߊ߫ ߤߌߣߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
